title: 快捷菜单插件的问题
author: aidu__
txt_content: 快捷菜单改怎样写出让他们用指定的物品和数量购买一样东西？求格式！Chest Commands插件！大神求教啊。。

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content:
COMMAND: 'give: 264'
      REQUIRED-ITEM: 3, 64
       NAME: 'Buy a diamond'
       ID: 264
       POSITION-X: 1
       POSITION-Y: 1

Sell items
The example below sells a diamond to players for a cost of 100 money.
example:
      COMMAND: 'give: 264'
      PRICE: 100
      NAME: 'Buy a diamond'
      ID: 264
      POSITION-X: 1
      POSITION-Y: 1

Buy items
The example below takes 64 dirt from the player and gives him 10 money.
example:
      COMMAND: 'givemoney: 10'
      REQUIRED-ITEM: 3, 64
      NAME: 'Sell dirt'
      ID: 3
      POSITION-X: 1
      POSITION-Y: 1

replies.author: 小猫boy
replies.txt_content:
jiuerd 发表于 2014-11-17 17:24
COMMAND: 'give: 264'
      REQUIRED-ITEM: 3, 64
       NAME: 'Buy a diamond'
你的头像好萌QWQ
